com.carJee.bean

Class CartBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carJee.bean.CartBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CartBeanLocal

    public class CartBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements CartBeanLocal
    Represents a cart during one user session. When a user adds a book for first time, a cartBean is created and will not be destroyed until user's session expires
